original_text: I myself will bring back together all my people who are still alive. I will fetch them from the countries where I have sent them. I will bring them back to the land that is their home. They will give birth to many children and they will grow in number.
korean_text: 내가 내 양 떼의 남은 것을 그 몰려 갔던 모든 지방에서 모아 다시 그 우리로 돌아오게 하리니 그들의 생육이 번성할 것이며

sentences.original_text: I myself will bring back together all my people who are still alive
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 직접 살아있는 내 모든 백성을 다시 모아들이겠다

sentences.original_text: I will fetch them from the countries where I have sent them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 보냈던 나라들에서 그들을 데려오겠다

sentences.original_text: I will bring them back to the land that is their home
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 그들의 고향 땅으로 데려오겠다

sentences.original_text: They will give birth to many children
and they will grow in number
